english.segment1: Verse: I don't know where I would be. Had it not been for you. You are my everything. Your love is so amazing
english.segment2: When I was in my sin. You came and rescued me. I give you all of me. Your love is so amazing
english.segment3: So amazing (repeat all). (lead)Jump Jump Jump jump Jump
english.segment5: Bridge: Your amazing. Your amazing - hey. Your amazing. So Amazing - hey. Your amazing. Your amazing , hey He's a mighty God (hey)
english.segment6: Hey Ooh. He's a mighty God. Hey Ooh. He's a mighty God. Hey Ooh. He's a mighty God. Hey Ooh
english.segment7: Your amazing. Your amazing - hey. Your amazing. So Amazing - hey. Your amazing. Your amazing , hey He's a mighty God (hey) repeat
english.segment8: Hey Ooh. He's a mighty God. Hey Ooh. He's a mighty God. Hey Ooh. He's a mighty God. Hey Ooh
